description: Hake is the Inukami of the head of the family, http://anidb.net/ch10265 [Kawahira Kayano], who gives out most of the missions for the other members of the Kawahira family. He made a contract with the head of the family when she was near http://anidb.net/ch10262 [Keita]`s age on a Non-contract day (coincidently her birthday fifty years before the start of the series), which he claims was because he was bored with his eternal, uneventful life. The contract item he was given are the decorative beads he wears. Also, there are evidence that his weakness are fleas.
name: Hake
